divs: Sighting DetailsMy partner and I went to see some friends of ours and their baby. We werewatching CNN News War on Iraq. We were just chatting about the war and lookingout at the lake when I noticed red lights hovering above the neighbors house 2doors down. I looked at my partner and said do you see that He says ya I seethat. Wow. Our friend was talking to us and he turned around to try to seewhat we were talking about. The door was open and I jumped up and ran out toget a better look. By the time we got to the door it was gone. No noise nonothing. Gone. Their living room is all windows so there is no way I couldhave missed it. Our friend did not see it and I know it was not a car orsomething passing by. It was dark out but there was like 5 red lights tracingaround the craft and it had one red light on the top. I feel like they werewatching us in the house. And when I got up to run to the door they took off.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lake Ozark
There were no other sightings in Lake Ozark on or around March 28th 2003
